definition: A term commonly employed to express agreement or similarity between two or more things, often used in response to a statement or action. It is frequently utilized in conversations to convey the idea of "likewise" or "also" when referring to a similar situation, action, or sentiment.

examples.german: Ich habe das Buch ebenfalls gelesen.
examples.english: I have also read the book.

examples.german: Er hat ebenfalls Interesse an Musik.
examples.english: He also has an interest in music.
